content: U.S. steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc  on Monday reported a lower quarterly net profit  which it blamed on a glut of lower-priced imports and higher customer inventories but said that it expects improvement in domestic U.S. steel production in 2016.
name: Steel Dynamics Inc
title: Cheap imports  high inventories hurt Steel Dynamics' profit

content: Oct 19 U.S. steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc  on Monday reported a lower quarterly net profit  which it blamed on a glut of lower-priced imports and higher customer inventories but said that it expects improvement in domestic U.S. steel production in 2016.
name: Steel Dynamics Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Cheap imports  high inventories hurt Steel Dynamics' profit

content: VANCOUVER  Oct 19 U.S. steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc on Monday reported a lower quarterly net profit  which it said was due to a glut of lower-priced imports and higher customer inventories.
name: Steel Dynamics Inc
title: Steel Dynamics' quarterly profit falls

content: June 22 Steel Dynamics Inc forecast a drop in second-quarter adjusted profit  citing a fall in average selling prices due to steel imports staying higher than anticipated.
name: Steel Dynamics Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Steel Dynamics forecasts dip in profit as steel prices stay low
